resources.string: Helps in improving balance, flexibility, and range of motion, reduce stress and anxiety for individuals with Parkinson disease
Helps in improving balance, flexibility, and range of motion, reduce stress and anxiety for individuals with Parkinson disease
Movenet MultiPose does not support GPU. Fallback to CPU.
Brilliant things happen in calm minds. Be calm. You\'re brilliant.
The act of meditation is being spacious.

Welcome to Softmove, your ultimate solution for addressing body stiffness and tracking your progress towards a healthier, more flexible body. We are an innovative AI-powered application dedicated to helping individuals overcome the challenges of stiffness, improve their flexibility, and maintain a record of their wellness journey. At Softmove, we understand the importance of a supple body in achieving overall well-being. Whether you are an athlete, a fitness enthusiast, or someone seeking relief from daily stiffness, our goal is to empower you with the tools and guidance to enhance your flexibility and lead a more active, pain-free life.
You are doing great. Go ahead!!
Breathing is the greatest pleasure in life.

string-array.name: motivating_quotes
string-array.item: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts." - Winston Churchill
"The secret of getting ahead is getting started." - Mark Twain
"Believe you can and you're halfway there." - Theodore Roosevelt
